job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtWhats the opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWorkRamp is growing steadily in a large well defined SAAS market We are currently looking for engineers that will help architect and lay the foundation for the company for the next few years At WorkRamp we strive for engineering excellence Our team is collaborative and impact focused and we hold each other to a high quality standard with code review Engineers own projects end to end You will work closely with our customer and design teams to identify the customer pain point architect a wellcrafted solution and deploy at scaleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat will I be doingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtOur Tech Stack Consists OfltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtRuby on Rails backendltligtltligtReact and MobX on the frontendltligtltligtPostgresltligtltligtDeployed on AWSltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtProjects You Might Work OnltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtRearchitect certain parts of the codebase to be more eventdriven evaluate different queueing systems make sure queued actions are idempotent etcltligtltligtA reportinganalytics engine to surface all the training metrics generated by our system Have the ability to filter by many different dimensions Figure out the data storagecaching mechanism to make queries performantltligtltligtSet up continuous testing pipeline Build up test suite and make sure it runs in a reasonable amount of time Integrate testing with our code review tool phabricatorltligtltligtImplement a new UI design on some of our most critical pages Make sure the UX makes sense and the page loads quicklyltligtltligtArchitecting developing and deploying new features for our core SAAS product in a full stack capacityltbrgtltligtltulgt ltstronggtWhat skills do I needltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtStrong desire to work at an earlystage startupltligtltligt14 years of industryexperience building product quality softwareltligtltligtExpert timemanagement and prioritization within a fastpaced environmentltligtltligtEffective at collaborating with crossfunctional teamsltbrgtltligtltulgtThe salary range for this position is 120000  200000ltbrgtltbrgt
